Package team14.warzone.GameEngine.State

Class StartupPhase

java.lang.Object
team14.warzone.GameEngine.State.Phase
team14.warzone.GameEngine.State.GamePlayPhase
team14.warzone.GameEngine.State.StartupPhase
public class StartupPhase
extends GamePlayPhase
Class defines the start up phase of the game Is started when a valid map is loaded
